bill_title: revise certain provisions relating to state fair contracts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions relating to state fair contracts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 1-21-17 be amended to read as follows: 1-21-17. The terms of any contract and the negotiations for any contract between the secretary of agriculture and any performers or entertainers may be kept confidential. However, sixty forty-five days after the expiration of such contract, the terms of such contract shall become a public record. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
